overview: Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios. "Three In A Barn" — Massive muscles and massive dicks. "Take Ten" (a.k.a. "Room Service") — Easier said than done… but our lad takes it all, again and again. "USMC Vs. USN" (a.k.a. "Picnic Lunch For 2") — Military challenges, as two servicemen explore their sexuality. "Black Power" — Black dominance prevails in a heavy, physical game of sex.
title: Take Ten
